md:
giải nghĩa từ "summertime" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Summertime** (noun)

* Meaning: Mùa hè (season of the year)
* Example sentence: "I love going to the beach during summertime."
* Related words: summer, heat, vacation, sunshine

**Summertime** (song title)

* Meaning: Tên bài hát "Mùa hè" (a song by DJ Jazzy Jeff & The Fresh Prince)
* Example sentence: "Summertime is one of my favorite songs of all time."
* Related words: music, hip-hop, classic, nostalgia

Note: The meaning of "summertime" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. In general, it refers to the season of the year, but it can also be used as a title for a song or a phrase to evoke a sense of nostalgia or relaxation.
